name: Rocking Knight
description:
A Prototype Game made in 2 hours 30 minutes. It was made with Unreal Engine with no Content or Scripts at all.

All the C++ Code, Blueprints, meshes and materials were created during that 2:30 minutes.
You can see the entire process in this stream:

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/437021095

Controls:

WASD => Move Knight

Arrow Keys => Shoot
